query:
SELECT 
  'Teacher Biographies' as tableName, 
  COUNT(*) as totalRecords,
  SUM(CASE WHEN lifeStory IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(lifeStory) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as withContent,
  AVG(LENGTH(lifeStory)) as avgLength
FROM teacher_biographies
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Integration Guides',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN beginnerPath IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(beginnerPath) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  AVG(LENGTH(beginnerPath))
FROM integration_guides
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Glossary Terms',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN definition IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  AVG(LENGTH(definition))
FROM glossary_terms
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Case Studies',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN scenario IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  AVG(LENGTH(scenario))
FROM case_studies;
